heading: HB06735
0: AN ACT MANDATING THE LAND BANK OF THE PHILIPPINES (LBP) TO FOCUS ON ITS CHARTER TO ALLOCATE SIXTY (60) PERCENT OF ITS TOTAL LOAN PORTFOLIO IN SOLELY PROVIDING  SUPPORT AND FINANCING SERVICES FOR FARMERS AND FISHERFOLKS ALL OVER THE COUNTRY, TO PROMOTE INCLUSIVE GROWTH AND IMPROVE THE QUALITY OF LIFE ESPECIALLY IN THE COUNTRYSIDE THROUGH THE DELIVERY OF INNOVATIVE SCHEMES, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
status: Pending with the Committee on BANKS AND FINANCIAL INTERMEDIARIES since 2017-12-05
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB06735
FULL TITLE : AN ACT MANDATING THE LAND BANK OF THE PHILIPPINES (LBP) TO FOCUS ON ITS CHARTER TO ALLOCATE SIXTY (60) PERCENT OF ITS TOTAL LOAN PORTFOLIO IN SOLELY PROVIDING SUPPORT AND FINANCING SERVICES FOR FARMERS AND FISHERFOLKS ALL OVER THE COUNTRY, TO PROMOTE INCLUSIVE GROWTH AND IMPROVE THE QUALITY OF LIFE ESPECIALLY IN THE COUNTRYSIDE THROUGH THE DELIVERY OF INNOVATIVE SCHEMES, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ROMERO, MICHAEL ODYLON L., Ph.D.
DATE FILED : 2017-11-29
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Bravo (M.) (000 2018-02-20)2. Loyola (000 2018-01-15)
3. Sy-Alvarado (000 2018-01-15)4. Aquino-Magsaysay (000 2018-01-15)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON BANKS AND FINANCIAL INTERMEDIARIES ON 2017-12-05
